about_the_game:
Welcome to our ambulance simulation game where you must respond quickly to new case information received on your radio. Your job is to pick up the patient and transport them to the hospital as fast as possible.



We offer various ambulance vehicles and an arcade-style game that will keep you entertained. Follow targeted case information throughout the city, pick up patients, and transport them to the hospital. Try to be the best driver possible as the center trusts you to fulfill the duties of a real paramedic. Experience what it means to be an ambulance driver!



With over 150 mission routes and different case scenarios in each mission, our ambulance simulation game offers endless hours of fun. If you tire of doing only ambulance driver jobs, you can try parking and stunt track modes, which are among the many content options available to you. Grow your career by completing the tracks consisting of fun and colorful road routes.




During the missions, you will catch up with cases in the city center, enter neighborhoods, and solve problems for citizens. You will also try to reach your goal in the mountains and fields. Each mission begins with a different scenario to keep things interesting. Choose the right ambulance vehicle prepared specifically for each terrain and start your mission. This city is counting on you!



If you get tired of completing tasks and want to explore the city, the Free Roam around the City option is for you. We have designed the city model in the game to be detailed and entertaining. We have equipped the city with ramps, secret tunnels, and surprises so that you can fly over buildings on every corner and road, as we promised to entertain you. Experience the day and night cycle in the game to make you feel like you are truly in the city.



We have also carefully prepared voiceovers that respond to the events you encounter in the game.

Additionally, the Ambulance Parking mode offers 10 different ambulance parking maps.

Features:
  • Great and original city structure and design.
  • Different and colorful stunt tracks.
  • Ambulance parking mode.
  • Arcade and simulation mix vehicle physics.
  • Fast gameplay.
  • Original content.

name: Ambulance Emergency Simulation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: All
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: All

short_description: New case information is constantly coming from your radio, you should pick up the patient and take him to the Hospital as soon as possible.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish*, Czech, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
